surname Jia

sentences.english: The emperor died suddenly, LiZhi, know that panic.
sentences.chinese: 皇上突然駕崩，李治等人知道後十分驚慌。

sentences.english: All the flags were at half-mast when the king died.
sentences.chinese: 國王駕崩，全國都下半旗誌哀。

sentences.english: China's first emperor Qin Shihuang died in 209 BC.
sentences.chinese: 公元前209年，中國第一位皇帝秦始皇駕崩。

sentences.english: The death of that emperor marked the end of a golden era.
sentences.chinese: 那位皇帝的駕崩代表着一段黃金時期的結束。

sentences.english: Ever since the big throne from sun in sky passes away, big Yan ugg boots red month then have been lining up infantry every front.
sentences.chinese: 自從天陽大帝駕崩，大燕和紅月便一直陳兵各條戰線。
